## Book App
<img alt="book-app-screenshot" src="https://private-user-images.githubusercontent.com/68085523/294765984-f132e566-aaf6-439e-bdf7-c39cca765fc9.png?jwt=eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9..5AAQ08EAlO9r01OC_0JtI3EkGHbyfteOn3TFXz9A4Us" style="max-width:100%; height: 150px;">

This app is created for personal use. Users can save book information, along with memos, by utilizing the Google Books API.

GitHub: https://github.com/Reikasan/Book-app

### Built with 
- Laravel
- React
- Material UI
- TypeScript
- MySQL
- Google Books API
